sentences.sContent: It is one of my favorite novels.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is one of my favorite novels.
sentences.sCn: 这是我最喜爱的一本小说。

sentences.sContent: This anemone is one of my favorite plants.
sentences.sContent_eng: This anemone is one of my favorite plants.
sentences.sCn: 这朵银莲花是我最喜爱的植物之一。

sentences.sContent: His favorite fruits and vegetables as well as 55 lb. of bamboo will be on board for nourishment.
sentences.sContent_eng: His favorite fruits and vegetables as well as 55 lb. of bamboo will be on board for nourishment.
sentences.sCn: 除了它最喜爱的水果和蔬菜以外还有55磅的竹子将会作为它在飞机上的食物。

synos.tran: 幸运儿；喜欢的事物；特别喜欢的人
最喜爱的；中意的；宠爱的

words.tran: 有利的；良好的；赞成的，赞许的；讨人喜欢的
有利的；受到优待的；受到喜爱的
赞成；宠爱；帮助（favor的过去分词）；给…以恩惠
